---
name: Review book
about: Issue to add a review to a book existing in the books database.
title: enter-review-title-here
labels: review
assignees: ''

---

Upon finding a book with the provided ID in the books database and if the provided reviewer as participant for this book, the review text and grade are inserted accordingly. 

---

# Review

- book id: `enter-book-id-here`
- reviewer: `enter-reviewer-name-here`
- grade: `enter-grade-here` (number from 1 to 15)
- review: `enter-review-text-here`
